content: I think I'll go with "The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People" by Stephen Covey. I've heard great things about it, and it seems like it could be really helpful for my personal growth. Also, I was wondering if you could help me with some tips on how to stay motivated to keep up with my daily routines, especially my meditation and journaling practice. I've been doing it for a while, but sometimes I find myself struggling to stay consistent.
